title: Setup Your MoErgo Glove80
description: Choose how to connect your Glove80 to your computer and follow the steps to get started with ease.

choice.title: Select Your Connection Method
choice.description:
The Glove80 supports multiple connection options.
Pick the one that suits your setup best.

bluetooth.title: Bluetooth Setup: Step 1 - Charge Batteries
bluetooth.description:
Charge both Glove80 batteries to ~80%. Tap the Magic key to check the battery level.
Green lights indicate a sufficient charge.

bluetooth.title: Bluetooth Setup: Step 2 - Enter Pairing Mode
bluetooth.description:
Hold the Magic key and tap Backspace to select Bluetooth profile 0.
Clear any previous Bluetooth profiles if necessary.

bluetooth.title: Bluetooth Setup: Step 3a - Connect to Device on Windows
bluetooth.description:
In your Bluetooth settings, Add Device, select 'Glove80' and connect/pair.
If youâ€™ve connected before, remove (unpair) device first.

bluetooth.title: Bluetooth Setup: Step 3b - Connect to Device on MacOS

usb.title: USB Setup: Step 1 - Locate USB-C Port
usb.description:
Find the USB-C port on the top edge of the Glove80.
Use the provided USB cable and avoid USB hubs.

usb.title: USB Setup: Step 2 - Connect the Cable
usb.description: Plug the Glove80 into your computer via the USB-C cable. The left half acts as the main controller, with the right half connecting wirelessly.

completion.title: Setup Complete!
completion.description: Your MoErgo Glove80 is ready! Enjoy its ergonomic design and customizable features.
